arts.ttl: Leverkusen delay Bayern's party with routine win over Augsburg
arts.sum: Two first-half goals was enough for Bayer Leverkusen to postpone Bayern's championship celebration for next week.

arts.ttl: Emiliano Buendía inspires Bayer Leverkusen to comfortable Augsburg win
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen's slim hopes of retaining their Bundesliga crown remain alive following a 2-0 win over Augsburg on Matchday 31 – the crucial points coming courtesy of first-half goals from Patrik Schick and Emiliano Buendía. Just before half-time, Emiliano Buendía made it 2-0 with a well-placed shot from inside the box, sending the home fans into raptures.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg preview: Last chance for outside title shot
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen look to take one final shot of gaining back-to-back Bundesliga titles as they hope to close an eight point gap at the top of the league versus Augsburg on Saturday in the BayArena.
